languages.text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.
languages.original_text: Максимальная длительность эффектов (в раундах), влияющих на способность перемещаться и действовать (таких как оглушение и неспособность атаковать), которые накладывают члены отряда.

traits.locale_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

languages.text: Максимальная длительность эффектов (в раундах), влияющих на способность перемещаться и действовать (таких как оглушение и неспособность атаковать), которые накладывают члены отряда.
languages.original_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

traits.locale_text: Максимальная длительность эффектов (в раундах), влияющих на способность перемещаться и действовать (таких как оглушение и неспособность атаковать), которые накладывают члены отряда.
Максимальная длительность эффектов (в раундах), влияющих на способность перемещаться и действовать (таких как оглушение и неспособность атаковать), которые накладывают члены отряда.

languages.text: Dieser Wert ist die Obergrenze der Dauer von durch Gruppenmitglieder verursachten Effekten, die die Fähigkeit zum Bewegen oder Handeln blockieren (wie z. B. Betäubt oder Angriff unmöglich). Die Dauer wird in Runden berechnet.
languages.original_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Wert ist die Obergrenze der Dauer von durch Gruppenmitglieder verursachten Effekten, die die Fähigkeit zum Bewegen oder Handeln blockieren (wie z. B. Betäubt oder Angriff unmöglich). Die Dauer wird in Runden berechnet.

languages.text: Cette valeur représente la durée maximale des effets infligés par tous les membres du groupe pour inhiber les capacités de déplacement ou d'action (comme Étourdissement ou Attaque impossible). La durée est calculée en rounds.
languages.original_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

traits.locale_text: Cette valeur représente la durée maximale des effets infligés par tous les membres du groupe pour inhiber les capacités de déplacement ou d'action (comme Étourdissement ou Attaque Impossible). La durée est calculée en rounds.

languages.text: 这个数值代表所有队伍成员造成的控制效果的持续时间上限，这些效果会限制目标移动或行动的能力（如眩晕与无法攻击）。持续时间的单位为轮。
languages.original_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

traits.locale_text: 这个数值代表所有队伍成员造成的控制效果的持续时间上限，这些效果会限制目标移动或行动的能力（如眩晕与无法攻击）。持续时间的单位为轮。

languages.text: Este valor es el límite máximo de duración de efectos infligidos por miembros del grupo que impiden que el enemigo se mueva o actúe (como aturdimiento o no puede atacar). La duración se mide en asaltos.
languages.original_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

traits.locale_text: Este valor es el límite máximo de duración de efectos infligidos por miembros del grupo que impiden que el enemigo se mueva o actúe (como aturdimiento o no puede atacar). La duración se mide en asaltos.

languages.text: この値は、部隊全員に与えられる、移動や行動を妨げる効果(スタンや攻撃不可など)の持続時間の上限である。持続時間はラウンド単位で計算される。
languages.original_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.

traits.locale_text: この値は、部隊全員に与えられる、移動や行動を妨げる効果(スタンや攻撃不可など)の持続時間の上限である。持続時間はラウンド単位で計算される。

languages.text: Bu değer, tüm grup üyeleri tarafından uygulanan ve hareket etme veya eylemde bulunma kabiliyetini kısıtlayan (sersemlik veya saldıramama gibi) etkilerin süresinin üst sınırıdır. Bu süre, raunt bazında hesaplanır.
languages.original_text: This value is the upper limit on the duration of effects inflicted by all party members which inhibit the ability to move or act (such as stunned or cannot attack). The duration is calculated in rounds.
